Description:
Retrieval of equipment for maintenance/repair and delivery of new/repaired equipment.
Offering support to install, update, modify, or fix required hardware issues.
Prepare accurate paperwork and facilitate the in-house team in carrying out technical evaluations.
Engage in the effective rollout process of the company's product or service launch.Skills
Skills:
Skilled in remotely installing, upgrading, troubleshooting, and repairing (at the component level) any of the personal computers.
Expert in the installation of client software and operating systems as per requirement.
Good command of remote processing of computing components and spare parts.
Remarkable command on the installation of computer OS and handling client software on the network.
